name: RadioRob
description:
This is my game for the 1-bit weekend jam.

You play as a robot that has to shutdown a nuclear reactor while fighting
other robots. The game was mainly a learning exercise to learn godot engine and pixel art, but I had a lot of fun working with the restrictions.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Walk / Aim
C - JumpX - Shoot

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen(on windows)

Credits and Tools

Game made with GodotEngine: https://godotengine.org/
Sounds made with sfxr: http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
Geiger Tick extracted from CC0 sound by parabolix: https://freesound.org/people/parabolix/sounds/417424/
Pixel "art" drawn with aseprite: https://www.aseprite.org/
Font: https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-pixel-fonts
